msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 4171; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; the papyrus is damaged: at the top to the left hand side and at the bottom to the left, also it is broken at the left margin at the beginning, two at the middle and at the end of the column as a result of five folds. Two Kollesis: between col.129 and 130 and at the right margin of the column. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. In a few cases of this column the scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
